text: Kaprada assembly constituency (કપરાડાં વિધાનસભા બેઠક) is one of the 182 assembly constituencies of Gujarat. It is located in Valsad district. The seat is reserved for member of scheduled tribes. This seat came into existence after 2008 delimitation. ==List of segments== This assembly seat represents the following segments, # Kaprada Taluka # Pardi Taluka (Part) Villages – Sonwada, Varai, Nimkhal, Panchlai, Lakhmapor, Nevri, Rabdi, Asma, Tarmaliya, Rohina, Samarpada, Dhagadmal, Daheli, Chival, Arnala, Pati, Goima, Barai, Dumalav, Ambach, Kherlav, Pandor, Rata, Kocharva, Vankachh, Koparli, Kaval, Karaya, Nani Tambadi, Degam, Moti Tambadi, Lavachha, Karamkhal, Chibhad Kachchh ==Total number of voters== http://ceo.gujarat.gov.in/download/PCAC.pdf {| class="wikitable" |- ! Election !! Polling Stations !! Male Voters !! Female Voters !! Others !! Total Voters |- | 2014 || 271 || 109340 || 107461 || 0 || 216801 |} ==Member of legislative assembly== *2012 – Jitubhai Chaudhari, Indian National Congress ==Election results== ===2012=== http://ceo.gujarat.gov.in/download/Detail_Report_AC2012.pdf ==References== ==See also== List of constituencies of Gujarat Legislative Assembly Gujarat Legislative Assembly Category:Assembly constituencies of Gujarat Category:Valsad district
title: Kaparada (Vidhan Sabha constituency)
